General.Name: Inner Mongolia Yuan Xing Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Inner Mongolia Yuan Xing Energy Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the soda ash, methanol, fertilizer and agricultural production materials, and other businesses in China. It offers soda ash for use in glass, metallurgy, papermaking, printing and dyeing, synthetic detergents, food, and medicine industries; and baking soda for use in food, feed, medicine, hygiene, and other industries, as well as urea used in various soils and crop growth. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia Yuanxing Natural Soda Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Inner Mongolia Yuan Xing Energy Company Limited in August 2007. Inner Mongolia Yuan Xing Energy Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Ordos, China.

4.Name: Mr. Yuhu  Ji
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
